sections.title: False Priest (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the False Priest class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (False Priest)
sections.description: False Priests gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Domain (False Priest)
sections.description: False Priests can select from Charm, Evil, Law, or Trickery domains, gaining domain powers but not domain spells, using Intelligence or Charisma instead of Wisdom.

sections.title: First Ritual (Su) (False Priest)
sections.description: Adds bless and cure light wounds as 2nd-level arcane spells, with cure light wounds healing temporary hit points instead of real damage, and provides +10 circumstance bonus to False Casting Bluff checks.

sections.title: False Channel (Su) (False Priest)
sections.description: Channel positive energy like a cleric but heals temporary hit points instead of real damage, scaling with class level and using Intelligence or Charisma modifier for uses per day.

sections.title: Master of Lies ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (False Priest)
sections.description: Adds class level to Bluff checks for lies and deceptions, and automatically detects when subject to truth-discerning magic.

sections.title: Second Ritual (Su) (False Priest)
sections.description: Adds cure moderate wounds and spiritual weapon as 3rd-level arcane spells, with cure spells granting temporary hit points, and improves False Casting bonus for higher level spells.

sections.title: Conversion (Su) (False Priest)
sections.description: When using false channel on himself, the effect heals real damage instead of granting temporary hit points.

sections.title: Third Ritual (Su) (False Priest)
sections.description: Adds cure serious wounds and prayer as 4th-level arcane spells, with cure spells granting temporary hit points, and extends False Casting bonus to 4th and 5th level spells.

sections.title: True Pretender (Su) (False Priest)
sections.description: Can spend two false channel uses to heal real damage to all creatures, and can use cleric spell trigger and completion items without Use Magic Device checks.
